p: A Quanta FEG 250 scanning electron microscope (SEM) was used to obtain the micrographs of the hydrogels at an acceleration voltage of 20 kV. For SEM analysis, the gels were chemically dehydrated in ethanol according to the procedure detailed in our previous publication [ 28], to preserve their pore structure as much as possible. A polarized light microscope (RXLr-2Pol, Radical, Ambala, India) was used to visualize the micrographs of the dried gels under cross-polarization conditions.
